tidbits.title: Island Diversity
tidbits.description: The Caribbean Netherlands comprises three islands—Bonaire, Sint Eustatius, and Saba—each with its own distinct culture, landscapes, and charm.

tidbits.title: Marine Biodiversity
tidbits.description: These islands are renowned for their stunning marine life and coral reefs, making them ideal destinations for diving, snorkeling, and nature enthusiasts.

tidbits.title: Diverse Communities
tidbits.description: The Caribbean Netherlands is home to diverse communities, with influences from European, African, and indigenous cultures, contributing to a vibrant local atmosphere.
